title: Incorrect rendering code samples in docs
body: I found a problem in docs https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/visualstudio/msbuild/msbuild-items all code samples has incorrect style. I check Github page by edit button all looks gook.

nodes.body: I see the same in multiple browsers. @Sarabeth-Jaffe-Microsoft can you check with our doc colleagues about a) if this is something we're doing wrong and b) what the best place to report this sort of issue is?
Thanks for letting us know, @mfilippov! The docs team is looking into the cause of this issue now.
